info.name: WSO2 Identity Server - Identity Provider Template Rest API
info.description:
This document specifies a **Application Template Management RESTful API** for **WSO2 Identity Server** .


Contact Support:
 Name: WSO2
 Email: architecture@wso2.org

request.description: This API provides the capability to retrieve the application template information by id.
This API provides the capability to delete an application template by id.
This API provides the capability to retrieve the list of templates.

item.name: Add provisioning and authentication enabled Google template

request.description: This API provides the capability to create a template for Google as a federated identity provider with authentication capability.
This API provides the capability to create a template for Google as a federated identity provider with authentication, and provisioning capabilities.

item.name: Add authentication enabled OIDC IdP template

request.description: This API provides the capability to create a template for Google as a federated identity provider with authentication, and provisioning capabilities.
